name: Tropical Square Dance Crisis
description:
Tropical Square Dance Crisis is a fast paced arcade puzzler. Don't let the fruit reach the center! Pop them with your trusty boomerang and escape to fight another day. How high can you score? How far can you go?

Endless play for high score.
Addictive retro soundtrack.
Game Center leaderboards and achievements.
Unrelenting expert mode for a true challenge.
Relenting beginner mode for casual fun.
Cute pixel graphics.

"I Can't Stop Dancing. This game has me hooked and afraid I'm going to miss my subway stop. Totally charming and fast paced with a fun retro feel." - Marcb726

"Clever and unique puzzler. This is the type of game that made me a fan of puzzle games. Its mechanic is unique and takes a little getting used to. Once it gets its hooks in you, it's impossible to put down." - onebigdoor

Take a tropical vacation in your pocket you won't be able to forget!
